title: Install Package
invalidUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL or user/repo format, e.g.: https://github.com/user/repo or user/repo
repoInfoError: Unable to get repository information, please check if the repository exists
releaseInfoError: Unable to get Release information for version {version}
releaseInfoErrorLatest: Unable to get Release information for latest version
fileValidationFailed: File validation failed, please check if the file is complete.
packageTypeUnknown: Unable to identify package type, please ensure the package contains the correct configuration file (one of plugin.json, widget.json, template.json, theme.json, icon.json).
targetDirExists: Target directory {path} already exists, clearing old package files...
noConfigFiles: No configuration files found (plugin.json, widget.json, template.json, theme.json, icon.json)
multipleConfigFiles: Multiple configuration files found: {files}, a package can only contain one type of configuration file
packageNameNotFound: Package name not found in configuration file (name or packageName field)
extractPackageNameError: Unable to extract package name from configuration file: {error}
iconReloadSuccess: Icon package installed and icons reloaded
iconReloadFailed: Icon package installed successfully, but failed to reload icons
iconReloadDialogContent: To ensure the icon package takes full effect, it is recommended to reload the interface. Reload now?
downloadTimeout: Download timeout, please check network connection
extractedDirEmpty: Extracted directory is empty or format is incorrect
packageNameMismatch: Package name mismatch: package name in config is [{configName}], but repository name is [{repoName}]. Package name must match repository name.
